channel.title: Different form of Hibernation
channel.description: Hi, If you hibernate your computer, it saves the state to disk [I think that's how it works]. I was wondering if it was possible to hibernate, reboot and use the computer in a different state, then reload the original state. If it is possible, how could one do this? Thanks Justis
